By definition,
%
\begin{align}
\pr{B|A} = \frac{\pr{AB}}{\pr{A}} 
\label{eq:axioms_6.8}
\end{align}
%
\begin{enumerate}
\item
\begin{align}
A &\subset B \implies \pr{AB} = \pr{A}
\\
\implies \pr{B|A} &= 1
\end{align}
%
upon substituting in \eqref{eq:axioms_6.8}
\item
\begin{align}
A \cup B = \phi \implies \pr{AB} = 0
\\
\implies \pr{B|A} &= 0
\end{align}
%
upon substituting in \eqref{eq:axioms_6.8}
\end{enumerate}
